# `<dso-banner>`

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property              | Attribute | Description                                                                                       | Type                                          | Default     |
| --------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `compact`             | `compact` | Compact mode.                                                                                     | `boolean`                                     | `false`     |
| `icon`                | `icon`    | *Icon can only be hidden when the 'compact' property is set to true.  Option to show banner icon. | `boolean`                                     | `false`     |
| `status` _(required)_ | `status`  | The status of the banner.                                                                         | `"error" \| "info" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `undefined` |
